languages.text: "Если бы я мог задать Императору один вопрос, я бы спросил: "Почему Патент наследуется?" Что, Лекс меня порази, может дать Империуму человек, который устраивает бессмысленную резню?"
"If I could ask the Emperor one question, it would be this: 'Why is the Warrant inherited?' By the Lex, what can a man who wreaks such mindless slaughter possibly give the Imperium?"
languages.original_text: "Если бы я мог задать Императору один вопрос, я бы спросил: "Почему Патент наследуется?" Что, Лекс меня порази, может дать Империуму человек, который устраивает бессмысленную резню?"

traits.locale_text: "If I could ask the Emperor one question, I would ask, 'Why is the Warrant inherited?' By the Lex, what can a man who wreaks such pointless butchery possibly give the Imperium?"
"If I could ask the Emperor one question, I would ask, 'Why is the Warrant inherited?' By the Lex, what can a man who wreaks such pointless butchery possibly give the Imperium?"
"If I could ask the Emperor one question, it would be this: 'Why is the Warrant inherited?' By the Lex, what can a man who wreaks such mindless slaughter possibly give the Imperium?"
"If I could ask the Emperor one question, it would be this: 'Why is the Warrant inherited?' By the Lex, what can a man who wreaks such mindless slaughter possibly give the Imperium?"
"If I could ask the Emperor one question, it would be this: 'Why is the Warrant inherited?' By the Lex, what can a man who wreaks such mindless slaughter possibly give the Imperium?"
"If I could ask the Emperor one question, it would be this: 'Why is the Warrant inherited?' By the Lex, what can a man who wreaks such mindless slaughter possibly give the Imperium?"

languages.text: “如果我有机会问帝皇本人一个问题，我想问祂：‘神圣授状为什么可以世代继承？’帝国法典在上，能犯下大屠杀这种恶行的愚蠢之人，究竟能为帝国带来什么益处呢？”
languages.original_text: "If I could ask the Emperor one question, it would be this: 'Why is the Warrant inherited?' By the Lex, what can a man who wreaks such mindless slaughter possibly give the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: “如果我有机会问帝皇本人一个问题，我想问祂：‘神圣授状为什么可以世代继承？’帝国法典在上，能犯下大屠杀这种恶行的愚蠢之人，究竟能为帝国带来什么益处呢？”

languages.text: «Si pudiera preguntarle una sola cosa al Emperador, sería esta: "¿Por qué la Patente es hereditaria?". Por la Lex, ¿qué puede aportar el responsable de esta matanza al Imperium?».
languages.original_text: "If I could ask the Emperor one question, it would be this: 'Why is the Warrant inherited?' By the Lex, what can a man who wreaks such mindless slaughter possibly give the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: «Si pudiera preguntarle una sola cosa al Emperador, sería esta: "¿Por qué la Patente es hereditaria?". Por la Lex, ¿qué puede aportar el responsable de esta matanza al Imperium?».

languages.text: « Si je pouvais poser une seule question à l'Empereur, ce serait celle-ci : "Pourquoi la lettre est-elle transmise par héritage ?" Par la Lex, que pourrait donc apporter à l'Imperium un homme capable de laisser libre cours à un tel carnage ? »
languages.original_text: "If I could ask the Emperor one question, it would be this: 'Why is the Warrant inherited?' By the Lex, what can a man who wreaks such mindless slaughter possibly give the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: « Si je pouvais poser une seule question à l'Empereur, ce serait celle-ci : "Pourquoi la lettre est-elle transmise par héritage ?" Par la Lex, que pourrait donc apporter à l'Imperium un homme capable de laisser libre cours à un tel carnage ? »

languages.text: 「もし皇帝陛下に一つだけ質問できるとしたら、こう尋ねたい―『なぜ令状は世襲されるのですか？』と。レックスの力で、こんな無分別な虐殺を繰り返す者が、いったい何を帝国にもたらすというんだ？」
languages.original_text: "If I could ask the Emperor one question, it would be this: 'Why is the Warrant inherited?' By the Lex, what can a man who wreaks such mindless slaughter possibly give the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: 「もし皇帝陛下に一つだけ質問できるとしたら、こう尋ねたい―『なぜ令状は世襲されるのですか？』と。レックスの力で、こんな無分別な虐殺を繰り返す者が、いったい何を帝国にもたらすというんだ？」

languages.text: "İmparator'a tek bir soru sorabilseydim şu olurdu: 'Ruhsatname neden miras bırakılır?' Lex aşkına, böyle akılsızca katliam yapan bir adam, İmparatorluk'a ne sunabilir ki?"
languages.original_text: "If I could ask the Emperor one question, it would be this: 'Why is the Warrant inherited?' By the Lex, what can a man who wreaks such mindless slaughter possibly give the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: "İmparator'a tek bir soru sorabilseydim şu olurdu: 'Ruhsatname neden miras bırakılır?' Lex aşkına, böyle akılsızca katliam yapan bir adam İmparatorluk'a ne sunabilir ki?"

languages.text: "Könnte ich dem Imperator eine Frage stellen, so wäre es diese: 'Warum wird der Handelsbrief vererbt?' Beim Lex, was sollte jemand, der ein so sinnloses Gemetzel veranstaltet, dem Imperium zu geben haben?"
languages.original_text: "If I could ask the Emperor one question, it would be this: 'Why is the Warrant inherited?' By the Lex, what can a man who wreaks such mindless slaughter possibly give the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: "Könnte ich dem Imperator eine Frage stellen, so wäre es diese: 'Warum wird der Handelsbrief vererbt?' Beim Lex, was sollte jemand, der ein so sinnloses Gemetzel veranstaltet, dem Imperium zu geben haben?"
